chanel.title: S.School : New Courses
chanel.description: Notifications About New Courses That We Have

item.title: Web Development
item.description: Take Web Design course online to build your design skills and advance your career.

item.title: Mobile Development
item.description: Improve your career options by learning Android and iOS app Development.

item.title: Game Development
item.description: Take a Game Development course and learn how to plan, design, create and publish your games on any platform.

item.title: Database Development
item.description: Learn how to optimize, improve performance, review and analysis statistics, use monitoring tools, and create indexes.

item.title: Data Science
item.description: Combine the power of Data Science, Machine Learning and Deep Learning to create powerful AI for Real-World applications.
